profile_overview: Circle helps businesses and developers harness the power of stablecoins for payments and internet commerce worldwide.
profile_bio:
Circle is a global financial technology firm that enables businesses of all sizes to harness the power of digital currencies and public blockchains for payments, commerce and financial applications worldwide.

Circle is also the principal operator of USDC, which has become the fastest growing, regulated and fully reserved dollar digital currency. USDC now stands at more than 45 billion and has supported about $1.4 trillion in transactions over the past year.

Today, Circle's transaction and treasury services are giving rise to a new generation of financial services and commerce applications that hold the promise of raising global economic prosperity through the frictionless exchange of financial value.

The Commissioner of Financial Regulation for the State of Maryland will accept all questions or complaints from Maryland residents regarding Circle Internet Financial, LLC (NMLS ID# 1201441) at 1100 North Eutaw Street, Suite 611, Baltimore, MD 21201, phone 1-888-784-0136. Circle's license status can be verified through the NMLS Consumer Access website at https://nmlsconsumeraccess.org.

Circle Internet Financial, LLC is licensed as a Money Transmitter by the New York State Department of Financial Institutions and to engage in Virtual Currency Business Activity by the New York State Department of Financial Services. https://www.circle.com/en/legal/licenses

extracted_posts.post_content: Is access to financial services a basic human right? If so, how do we help the almost 2 billion unbanked adults participate in the global economy? See how#USDCmight be the secret to financial inclusion fromDante A. Disparte.

Imagine paying a fee just to email and waiting days to receive it. That’s how money works today, but we built#USDCto bring the promise of the open internet to money. 

Hear fromKash Razzaghion how some of the world’s most innovative companies are harnessing the power and speed of USDC.#OpenMoneyEra

We are thrilled thatCoincheck, Inc., a leading force in Japan’s cryptocurrency market, plans to expand access to#USDCin Japan. 

“Our collaboration with Coincheck is foundational in bringing the stability and reliability of USDC to the Japanese market. We are excited to work with Coincheck to pave the way for a new era in digital finance in Japan.” -Jeremy Allaire, CEO and co-founder of Circle.

Read more about the collaboration here:

This year is setting up to be a big one with more#Web3innovations from developers. Over the past year, our Developer Marketing team put together a community of builders that use#USDCand our Web3 Services. 

So what’s in store for 2024? 

🛠️ More educational content to help developers learn and build 
🛠️ Ecosystem grants and bounty programs that support projects using USDC, Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol (#CCTP), Programmable Wallets and more
🛠️ Global presence at industry events and hack-a-thons

Read more on what to expect in 2024 👇

Circlereposted this Chief Legal Officer and Head of Corporate Affairs at Circle A few weeks ago, I had the privilege of speaking at the Stevens Center for Innovation in Finance atThe Wharton Schoolas part of their FinTech Lecture Series. I gave a talk on the Dollar's Digital Future and why that future matters to Wharton students and to young professionals throughout the country. 

How we digitize the dollar is one of the most critical public policy questions of our time and will determine how we and our children interact with the internet today and into the future. 

The Wharton students were already incredibly knowledgeable on these issues - it was great to see how intelligent and diligent our future public and private sector leaders are. I came away impressed with Wharton and my alma mater, theUniversity of Pennsylvania. The future for digital dollars, and America, is bright!

We are excited to announce our strategic partnership withOVERDAREto revolutionize the mobile gaming world. 

By integrating#USDCpayouts and our Programmable Wallets for OVERDARE’s game content creators, we are making it easier for game content creators to collaborate and build new user experiences, and seamlessly receive digital payouts using secure#Web3wallets.  This expansion of Web3 wallets not only enhances the gaming experience but also sets the stage for the future of mobile gaming. 

“We believe this partnership will be a catalyst in shaping the future of digital entertainment, ultimately fostering an innovative Web3 environment for all.” -Jeremy Allaire, CEO and co-founder of Circle.

Read more about the collaboration here:

It’s official.#USDCis now available on Celo mainnet!

✅ Businesses and institutions can access on/off-ramps for USDC on Celo with Circle Mint and its APIs.
✅ Developers can use USDC on Celo to build on a stable foundation that’s built to last and officially supported by Circle.
✅ USDC is an open-source, permissionless protocol that enables apps to send and store digital dollars.

Learn more about the benefits of USDC and what it means for the Celo ecosystem. 👇

Insights on the value of blockchain technology provided byJosh Burek, our Senior Director of Strategic Positioning. 

"Fortunately, responsible market players today are using blockchain to do many other things: delivering mobile, corruption-resistant humanitarian aid to refugees; lowering the costs of charitable giving, remittances, and cross-border payments by 80%; expanding access to basic financial services; giving workers in high-inflation countries a portable store of value; establishing provenance to power the “creator economy”; transmitting money at scale with the ease, security, and speed with which the internet transmits data; and upgrading legacy financial rails that date back to the 1970s." 

Read more inProject Syndicate👇 18,533 followers Innovations must pass three tests of public trust to go mainstream. Blockchain has passed two, but it needs public policymakers to take care of the third one, writesCircle'sJosh Burek.

In our latest Ecosystem Spotlight, we highlight how integrating#USDCand Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol (#CCTP) has helpeddYdXprocess over $10 billion in trading volume. 

See how the dYdX team is making it easier for users across blockchains to onboard directly to their leading DEX experience.

Technology and innovations continue to expand beyond borders. The future of finance needs to follow suit.

"Money is borderless, it is frictionless, and it is meant to be broadly fungible and interoperable with the banking system, and with monetary policy run by central banks." -Dante A. DisparteIn the latest#TRMTalksfromTRM Labs, Dante joinsAri Redbordto discuss:

👉 open money innovation, financial inclusion, and financial integrity

This content isn’t available here Get full access in the Linkedin app

What does#USDCmake possible? 

For those affected by inflation, USDC can provide financial security.

Digital dollars like#USDCare helping to drive the future of finance forward. The#OpenMoneyErais now. 👇 657,432 followers The penny…
$1.2 million worth of them go missing every year.
It costs nearly 3x the value of one just to make one.
And it’s been 167 years since its last update.

Thankfully, crypto can move the penny forward.
Right, Abe?

Trust is critical. We’ve built our business on it. So we’re energized to take part in this year’sWorld Economic Forum(#WEF) meeting in Davos, Switzerland. Its theme? “Rebuilding Trust.” 

For us, this effort begins by being open about who we are, what we do, how we do it, and why we do it. It’s embedded in our programming, emblazoned on the walls of our Promenade storefront, and enshrined in our values.

As we continue into the#OpenMoneyEraat#wef24, we’re hosting dozens of conversations with leading companies from around the world to discuss how, together, we can accelerate a trusted internet financial system. One that’s inherently inclusive, interoperable, and seamless – and that delivers value for billions of people, millions of businesses, and developers everywhere.

👉 We’ll be sharing more from#Davoslater this week, so be sure to stay tuned:https://lnkd.in/d3iArnvG

We’re diving into our#OpenMoneyEra. 👀 

What is Open Money? 

Open money is a big idea, rooted in the open and interoperable design of the internet. Open money can empower almost anyone, anywhere in the world, to access and use dollars on the internet with speed and ease.

Open money unlocks global access to credit markets, banking, enterprise commerce, and financial aid relief that can be delivered nearly instantly, and nearly for free.

Open money is doing for money what the internet did for information: Making it move more economically, quickly, and seamlessly.

Latin America is embracing digital finance and the next internet era. See how 👇#DidYouKnow- From mid-2021 to mid-2022, citizens of LatAm countries received $562 billion in digital currency value. 

According to Mastercard, 51% of Latin American consumers have made a purchase with digital currency and one-third have used a stablecoin for everyday purchases. 

This explosive growth is largely fueled by a simple-yet-powerful value proposition — expanded access.

Latin America is primed to drive this shift globally because of: 
👉 Necessity: many populations within the region lack access to analog financial services
👉 Demographics: LatAm has a population of 658 million — roughly double the US. Nearly a quarter of this population is aged 14 or younger, giving LatAm another key advantage over other global regions with aging populations
👉 Developers: there are nearly a million developers in the region who are active in offshore development, much of which is outsourced by American companies
👉 Regulatory support: Fintech is also widely supported by policymakers, since it provides financial authorities with new tools to manage risks and compliance. LatAm fintech sector has recently doubled in size and now features approximately 2500 platforms

Taken together, Latin America’s well-established market demand, policy support and widespread dollar usage make the region a natural fit for broader stablecoin adoption. 

Read the full Executive Insights bySpencer SpinnellandRachel Mayerto learn more about our vision of internet-native financial infrastructure in LatAm.

Digital dollars that deliver efficient financial access across borders. That is one of the powerful real-world use cases of#USDC. Hear more on the evolving financial landscape from#TheMoneyMovementepisode withJeremy Allaireand Sigal Mandelker.

We are proud to announce that we have achieved a significant early milestone in establishing our European regulatory platform with both a conditional DASP Registration in France and the appointment of Coralie Billmann as Managing Director of Circle in France. 

This achievement reinforces our commitment to regulatory compliance, fostering trust, and promoting the widespread adoption of payment stablecoins. 

We believe that a strong regulatory framework is essential to empower businesses, drive financial inclusion, and facilitate cost-effective global payments.https://lnkd.in/g-pmDrMH

Asia represents nearly 50% of the world’s population and is embracing the economic opportunities presented by digital finance. 

Regulators around the region are leading the charge on responsible innovation and adoption of digital currencies like#USDC. Hear more from our team on the momentum and benefits of digital currency transformation in the APAC region.

This month we are proud to mark the 1-year anniversary of our first-of-a-kind partnership withStellar Development FoundationandUNHCR, the UN Refugee Agency, to deliver cash assistance to war-impacted and displaced persons in Ukraine via#USDC. 

Over the past year, recipients have been able to safely receive, spend and save digital cash assistance in the form of USDC into a wallet on their mobile device. 

The program, which is designed to be easy, allows recipients to conveniently convert this assistance to cash, withdrawing their funds in dollars, euros, or local currency via thousands of localMoneyGram Internationallocations, or to transfer the amount to a personal bank account. This support can then be used to cover basic needs like rent, food, medical care and heating during the winter.

Over the past couple of years, the Argentine peso has experienced more than 100% annual inflation, dramatically reducing the value of savings and purchasing power for everyday citizens.

Many Argentinian workers receive their paychecks in Argentine pesos. Converting those pesos to US dollars is a desirable way to retain the value of their hard-earned money, but it’s not feasible to open US dollar bank accounts because of government capital controls. 

That’s whereLemonand#USDCcome in. 👇

Lemon is an Argentina-based crypto exchange and digital wallet that operates in seven Latin American countries. They integrate traditional finance with crypto for their 2.2M users to empower them with better financial services.

By making a stable currency available to users and allowing them to easily spend it in their day-to-day lives, Lemon grew 200x in a period of just 2 years. Partnering with Circle to educate users about the benefits of USDC, Lemon saw USDC use double in the 3rd quarter of 2023 alone. 🔥

Read the full story to see how Lemon uses USDC:https://lnkd.in/g2bXmc4X

This is not only a testament to the collective values that are at the core of our culture, but also underscores our belief in contributing to Singapore’s stature as a global hub for responsible financial services innovation. 

We are proud of our exceptional team and this award is a stepping stone towards even greater accomplishments.

We remain committed to providing a collaborative and innovative environment for our team and partners, and making the movement of money more accessible, inclusive and efficient for everyone.

Earlier this year, we joined theSolana Foundationto co-host the first of its kind Sol.Ladies edition of their global Hackerhouse series. 🛠 

The Sol.Ladies edition of Solana’s Hackerhouse not only showcased the vibrant potential of the#Web3space but also hosted a stirring dialogue aimed at encouraging young women to take the blockchain realm by storm.

Our latest video captures this empowering message, emphasizing the importance of trust, transparency, and community in driving innovative change. The future of#Web3is luminous, with women leading the charge towards groundbreaking transformation.
